H0.text: Galvanic is the type of process that corrosion is.

H1.text: Electrolysis is the kind of process that corrosion is.

H2.text: Oxidation is the kind of process that corrosion is.

H3.text: Electromagnetic is the type of process that corrosion is.

A4.text: Corrosion is the gradual deterioration of materials by chemical or electrochemical reaction with their environment.

A5.text: Rusting, the formation of red-orange iron oxides, is perhaps the most familiar example of electrochemical corrosion.
